plot: An animated short in which two volunteers demonstrate the proper way to vent the aggressive feelings that one has for one's fellow man from time to time. Calmly, quietly, and with as many power tools as possible.   Written by  Jean-Marc Rocher
title: Push Comes to Shove
plot_es: An animated short in which two volunteers demonstrate the proper way to vent the aggressive feelings that one has for one's fellow man from time to time. Calmly, quietly, and with as many power tools as possible.   Written by  Jean-Marc Rocher
